Introduction

Hello! I am an AI engineer who dreams of developing robot intelligence. Specifically, my interest area in robots is dealing with 3D data given by sensor or vision.
The current research area is 6d-pose-estimation for use in robot grasping. To break down this problem, I used FFB6D or DenseFusion models.

Project

2018-2021: Describing Robot’s Visual Context from Both of Robot’s Egocentric View and Other’s View for Effective Cooperation Based on Other’s Intent Recognition @ SEOULTECH (funded by NRF Young Researchers)

  • Develop robot vision considering the perspective of the robot and human
  • Goal is to develop a robot that understands human intent and collaborates efficiently

2018-2020: Three-Dimensional Architectural Geometric Representation Integrated with Image Processing Technology @ SEOULTECH, Main Research Group: Korea University (funded by NRF Basic Research Labs)

  • Develop architectural information using UAV & Lidar data
  • Generate 2D planes from 3D point cloud acquire from sensor

2022:Garbage Grasp Robot

  • Develop robot S/W for throwing trash
  • Object Detection + Grasping Model
